duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide leadership and strategic direction for a small non-profit organization focused on art and dance.
Oversee financial management, grant writing, and fundraising efforts to support organizational sustainability.
Manage community communications and relationships, collaborating with the board of directors and volunteers.
Supervise staff, program development, and event management to ensure program quality and organizational growth.
Execute day-to-day administrative tasks and facility management duties, and work with rental groups and volunteers to facilitate events.

education_certification.credential: Degree in Arts Administration or related field (Master's preferred)
